artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: The Thai Silk Co. Ltd.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Handwoven silk shibori cloth with regular pattern of vertical pale brown and orange-red bands of varying width. Same as 99.1.743.2 but larger.Handwoven silk shibori cloth with pattern of horizontal 1" stripes of beige and mauve with thin pale purple vertical lines. nougat
